alert.note: Alert for Lee (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 3:24PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bastrop and west central Lee Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 323 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Camp Swift, or 9 miles southeast of Elgin, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elgin, Bastrop, Camp Swift, Circle D-KC Estates, Knobb Springs, Phelan, Bastrop State Park, Alum Creek, McDade, Butler, Cedar Hills and Buescher State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
